intro: A journey to the ever-blooming cherry tree of a forgotten promise…
description:
After a small twist of fate, the main character returns to the town where he once lived.
Each time he wakes, he remembers a long-forgotten promise—made with someone, somewhere, in the distant past.
And just like those memories, strange dreams begin to visit him, as if gently guiding him forward.
A quiet townscape. A peaceful life that seems unchanged yet slowly shifting with time.
Moments spent with the girls he meets there begin to slowly melt the walls around his heart.
When he finds the courage to face the emotions he had long forgotten—
Whose hand will he take? And what future will he choose?
Beyond each choice lies more than just one ending of the heart.

Dreaming in Cherry Blossoms, I Fall in Love with You
A bittersweet yet tender story where past and present, memory and feeling, intertwine—
And now, the tale begins.

◆ Highlights of the Game ◆

・A heartfelt story that blends tenderness and sorrow, sure to leave a deep impression.

・A tale that walks the line between love and something more—perfect for all visual novel fans.

・Brought to life by an all-star voice cast, adding rich emotion to every scene.

・Don’t miss the theme song “Melody of the Night Sky” sung by Rin Kurusu, the voice actor of Cherry!

・Every scene is fully voiced—including side characters!

・Beautiful artwork and soothing music that gently resonate with your heart.

◆Character Introduction◆

・Cherry（CV. Rin Kurusu）
A spirit of the cherry tree who suddenly appears before the main character.
She longs for the main character to live a peaceful, happy life.
As a third-class high ranked spirit from the spirit world, her voice has the power to stir hearts—and even create miracles.

・Wathy（CV. Saku Mizuno）
A spirit born from nature itself, who has protected the main character’s town for centuries.
As a second-class high ranked spirit, she keeps a close eye on Cherry to make sure nothing goes wrong.
Though serious about her role, she’s curious about human culture… and secretly loves ketchup.

・Yuri Takai（CV. Yurina Uchiyama）
The main character’s childhood friend—smart, athletic, and the class rep.
She’s dependable and always looking out for the main character, even if she can be a bit bossy.
She cared for the main character since they were kids, but as Cherry grows closer with him, her feelings start to get complicated.

・Shoko Ina（CV. Non Harusaki）
The main character’s landlady and homeroom teacher.
She’s calm, sharp-tongued, and has a mature air, but always keeps an on the main character.
Like an older sister, she knows when to push—and when to playfully tease.

・Yua Orihara（CV. Manatsu Murakami）
Classmate and another childhood friend of the main character.
Soft-spoken and kind, but quietly strong at heart.
She naturally cares for others and supports the main character in her own way.

・Hayato Kusanagi（CV. Kakeru Hatano）
A cheerful, sporty classmate who lights up the room.
He’s a basketball ace, but also a true friend who’s always got the main character’s back.
Loyal, energetic, and full of heart.
